skills.name: Rebirth
skills.blurb: {{sbc|Innate:}} Periodically, upon {{tip|death|dying}}, {{ci|Anivia}} will instead revert into an egg. If the egg can survive for a few seconds, she is gloriously {{tip|resurrection|reborn}}.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Periodically, upon taking {{tip|death|fatal damage}}, '''Anivia''' enters {{tip|resurrection}} for 6 seconds and restores all of her {{sti|{{as|health}}}}.

While in resurrection, '''Anivia''' is {{tip|lockout|unable to act}} and gains {{pp|-40 to 20 for 5|1;5;8;12;15|changedisplay=true}} {{sti|armor|{{as|'''bonus''' armor}}}} and {{sti|mr|{{as|'''bonus''' magic resistance}}}}.
If '''Anivia''' remains alive by the end of the duration, she is revived with her {{as|'''current''' health}}.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Periodically, upon taking fatal damage, Anivia enters resurrection for 6 seconds and restores all of her health.
While in resurrection, Anivia is unable to act and gains 1;5;8;12;15 ‒ undefined bonus armor and bonus magic resistance.
If Anivia remains alive by the end of the duration, she is revived with her current health.
skills.notes:
* Triggering ''Rebirth'' will break {{tip|tether|tethers}} on '''Anivia'''.
* {{ai|Chronoshift|Zilean}} and {{ii|Guardian Angel}} will take priority over ''Rebirth''.
* If ''Rebirth'' triggers while '''Anivia''' is channeling {{si|Teleport}}, her channel won't be interrupted.
** All other {{tip|channel|channels}} will be interrupted upon triggering ''Rebirth''.
* The following refers for interactions while '''Anivia''' is resurrecting:
{{ct|move=false|cast=false|attack=false|items=false|consume=false|spells=false|interrupts=death}}

skills.name: Flash Frost
skills.blurb:
{{sbc|Active:}} {{ci|Anivia}} sends a chunk of ice in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} enemies hit.
''Flash Frost'' can be recast while the ice is in flight, and does so automatically at max range.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Anivia''' launches a chunk of ice in the target direction that deals {{as|magic damage}} to enemies hit and {{tip|slow|slows}} them by {{pp|changedisplay=true|key=%|20;20 to 40 for 3|0 to 3|type = [[File:Glacial Storm.png|20px|border|link=]] Glacial Storm's Rank|formula = 20%+(10%*(''Glacial Storm'' Rank-1))}} for 3 seconds.
''Flash Frost'' can be recast after while the ice is in flight, and does so automatically at maximum range.
{{sbc|Recast:}} The ice shatters, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|stun|stunning}} nearby enemies for a duration, as well as refreshing the {{tip|slow}}.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Anivia launches a chunk of ice in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit and slows them by 0 to 3 ‒ undefined for 3 seconds.
Flash Frost can be recast after while the ice is in flight, and does so automatically at maximum range.
Recast: The ice shatters, dealing magic damage and stunning nearby enemies for a duration, as well as refreshing the slow.
leveling:
{{st|Pass through damage|{{ap|50 to 130}} {{as|(+ 25% AP)}}}}
{{st|Explosion Damage|{{ap|60 to 200}} {{as|(+ 45% AP)}}|Total Damage|{{ap|50+60 to 130+200}} {{as|(+ 70% AP)}}}}
skills.notes:
*The initial cast and the manual recast count as ability activations for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
** If the ability is not manually recasted, the secondary effect will trigger without being considered as an ability activation.
* ''Flash Frost'' can only proc {{ri|Conqueror}} once even if it damages the same target twice.
* ''Flash Frost'' will fire from wherever '''Anivia''' was at the start of the cast time.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} can only prevent either the collision hit or recast from affecting the target.

effects.str:
• Pass through damage: (+ 25% AP)
  • Explosion Damage: (+ 45% AP)
  • Total Damage: (+ 70% AP)

skills.name: Crystallize
skills.target_range: {{tt|1000|Maximum cast range for wall center}} / {{tt|100|Minimum cast range}}
skills.blurb: {{sbc|Active:}} {{ci|Anivia}} {{tip|airborne|erects}} a wall of ice that lingers for a few seconds, blocking movement.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Anivia''' summons a wall of ice at the target location perpendicular to her facing, {{tip|airborne|knocking}} all units away from it (though not through terrain). The wall lingers as impassable terrain for 5 seconds.
skills.descriptionHtml: Active: Anivia summons a wall of ice at the target location perpendicular to her facing, knocking all units away from it (though not through terrain). The wall lingers as impassable terrain for 5 seconds.
leveling: {{st|Width (pathfinding)|{{tip|pathing radius|icononly = true}} {{ap|600|700|800|900|1000}} units|Number of ice segments|{{ap|4|5|6|7|8}} chunks of ice|Distance between outermost segments|{{ap|400|500|600|700|800}} units|Distance between individual segments|{{ap|133.33|125|120|116.67|114.29}} units}}
skills.notes:
* ''Crystallize's'' displacement triggers in-combat effects by dealing 0 {{tip|proc damage|proc}} {{tip|true damage}}, such as drawing turret aggro, {{ri|Sudden Impact}} and applying {{ii|Elixir of Sorcery}}.
* Individual ice chunks have both 100 units {{tip|pathing radius}} and {{tip|gameplay radius}}.
* {{tip|champion|Champions}} are knocked 120 units to either side of a wall segment, non-champions 250 units.
** {{pending for test}} Knockback speed?
* Player-generated terrain such as ''Crystallize'' does not block {{tip|sight}}.

effects.str:
• Width (pathfinding): pathing radius units
  • Number of ice segments: chunks of ice
  • Distance between outermost segments: units
  • Distance between individual segments: units

st_slices: pathing radius units

skills.name: Frostbite
skills.blurb:
{{sbc|Active:}} {{ci|Anivia}} blasts a freezing wind at the target enemy, dealing {{as|magic damage}}.
If the target had been recently hit by {{ai|Flash Frost}} or {{ai|Glacial Storm}}, the damage is {{ccs|doubled|magic}}.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Anivia''' blasts a freezing wind at the target enemy, dealing {{as|magic damage}}.
If the target was hit by {{ai|Flash Frost|Anivia}} or was inside a fully formed {{ai|Glacial Storm|Anivia}} within the last 3 seconds, ''Frostbite's'' damage is {{ccs|doubled|magic}}.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Anivia blasts a freezing wind at the target enemy, dealing magic damage.
If the target was hit by Anivia's Flash Frost or was inside a fully formed Anivia's Glacial Storm within the last 3 seconds, Frostbite's damage is Unknown value: ccs / doubled / magic.
skills.notes:
* The damage of ''Frostbite'' is calculated once it hits. If the target's mark from being hit by {{ai|Flash Frost|Anivia}} or a fully formed {{ai|Glacial Storm|Anivia}} wares off while the projectile is traveling, the damage is not doubled.
* ''Frostbite'' has a different sound effect when it hits a target for double damage.

skills.name: Glacial Storm
skills.blurb:
{{sbc|Toggle:}} {{ci|Anivia}} summons a driving rain of ice and hail at the target location that continually deals {{tip|magic damage}} and {{tip|slow|slows}} enemies within.
''Glacial Storm'' is deactivated when '''Anivia''' leaves it or gets hit by {{tip|crowd control|disables}}.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Anivia''' calls forth a driving rain of ice and hail at the target location, dealing {{as|magic damage}} every {{fd|0.5}} seconds to enemies within and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for 1 second, refreshing every {{fd|0.5}} seconds while inside. ''Glacial Storm'' can be recast after 1 second, and does so automatically if '''Anivia''' goes too far away from the storm, becomes unable to pay the {{sti|{{as|mana}}}} cost, or is affected by any form of {{tip|interrupt|interrupting}} {{tip|crowd control}}.

The blizzard increases in size over {{fd|1.5}} seconds. At maximum size, ''Glacial Storm's'' damage is increased by 200% and the effectiveness of its slow is increased by 50%, which also instead lasts {{fd|1.5}} seconds and refreshes every {{fd|0.25}} seconds while inside.
{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Anivia''' deactivates ''Glacial Storm'', dealing one last tick of [[damage]].
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Anivia calls forth a driving rain of ice and hail at the target location, dealing magic damage every 0.5 seconds to enemies within and slowing them for 1 second, refreshing every 0.5 seconds while inside. Glacial Storm can be recast after 1 second, and does so automatically if Anivia goes too far away from the storm, becomes unable to pay the mana cost, or is affected by any form of interrupting crowd control.
The blizzard increases in size over 1.5 seconds. At maximum size, Glacial Storm's damage is increased by 200% and the effectiveness of its slow is increased by 50%, which also instead lasts 1.5 seconds and refreshes every 0.25 seconds while inside.
Recast: Anivia deactivates Glacial Storm, dealing one last tick of damage.
leveling:
{{st|Magic damage per tick|{{ap|30 to 60}} {{as|(+ {{fd|12.5}}% AP)}}}}
{{st|Slow|{{ap|20 to 40}}%}}

{{st|Empowered damage per tick|{{ap|30*3 to 60*3}} {{as|(+ {{fd|37.5}}% AP)}}}}
{{st|Empowered Slow|{{ap|20*1.5 to 40*1.5}}%}}
skills.notes:
*Toggle abilities do not count as ability activations for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* ''Glacial Storm's'' slow leaves a trail that is visible even if the target is [[stealth]]ed.
* ''Glacial Storm'' deals 3 half ticks at {{ap|200|267|333}} radius for a total of {{fd|1.5}} normal damage ticks before it starts dealing empowered damage at 400 radius.
* {{tip|Stasis (buff)|Stasis}} via {{ii|Stopwatch}} / {{ii|Zhonya's Hourglass}} doesn't interrupt ''Glacial Storm''.
** {{cai|Devour|Tahm Kench}} '''does''' interrupt (allied and enemy) ''Glacial Storm''.

effects.str:
• Magic damage per tick: (+ 12.5% AP)
  • Slow: %

• Empowered damage per tick: (+ 37.5% AP)
  • Empowered Slow: %
